title: Random Dc ingame. Anyone had this problem before?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.
SO I had this problem before like 30 games or so but it was one to two years back and now it happens again. I have normal games where my ms is 30/40 all the time and then I have many games in a row where my ping explodes and my internet stops completely and im pretty sure that its not my internet or my modem's beacuse i have normal ping in many other games (expect form LoL), i even tried playing on EuN to see if it changed anything but no it didn't . Sometimes when i play my ms/ping jump from 30/40 to 4000+ and it dc from the game and it dosen't reconnect 
to the game so I have to leave and get the long ass que times.. plz help....... in the game where it says I left/leave i didn't we won but it still says that i left as you can see.
                                           (Sorry for my bad english) i even had this problem on a diffent pc and now i can't play {{champion:41}}  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It sounds like you're having random lag spikes, which can be caused by a bad or poor connection to the game server.  No worries, I'd like to help!  Even though your net might work fine accessing other sites, you can still have problems reaching the game server specifically.  You can use our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis of what's happening.  The results will also provide some troubleshooting steps to help.  Let me know what you find!

i tried alot of stuff and nothing worked. my ping stops at 4-8 min and then I lost connection and it didn't recover from there.
I wont be trying to see if my ping works anymore beacuse i got leave busted and i dont want to wait 20 min every game

i tired the Hextech Repair Tool and i got this https://gyazo.com/2e955b86ec75d55bf560041ed4823e27 
i don't know what to do now to be honest

Thanks for trying all that as well as grabbing the HRT.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help!  Attach the logs provided by the HRT to your ticket for some more context.  We'll respond asap!

sorry for the wait. well I tried the stuff on the "Log reader" and it didnt work, and im thinking it might be my modem at this point but it's super weird because as i said other games run fine and im not using wireless connection{{item:3070}}

When you say the log reader didn't work, what do you mean?  Were there no results?  In this case, go over every step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule put possibilities with your network or modem settings.  This should get you squared away, but let me know!
